email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out from Maritime Trade Services to offer a shipment of 75,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam. We have the vessel OCEAN BREEZE available for this route, with a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 225m.

Our starting freight quote is USD 22.50 per metric ton on CIF terms. The laycan is tentatively set for 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25.

Please let me know if you have any questions or require further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems reasonable, but we would like to explore the possibility of a lumpsum freight rate for this shipment. Could you provide a lumpsum quote for the entire cargo?

Additionally, could you confirm the vessel's speed and fuel consumption?

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Charterer Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for your response. We can offer a lumpsum freight rate of USD 1,650,000 for the entire cargo. The OCEAN BREEZE has a service speed of 14 knots and a fuel consumption of 40MT per day.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further adjustments.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the lumpsum offer. We are considering it, but would like to negotiate the rate down to USD 1,600,000. Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Charterer Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

We can agree to the revised lumpsum rate of USD 1,600,000. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day.

Please confirm your acceptance, and we can proceed with finalizing the laycan and other details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

We accept the revised lumpsum rate of USD 1,600,000. Please confirm the laycan as 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25 and ensure all necessary arrangements are in place.

Looking forward to a smooth operation.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Charterer Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for your confirmation. The laycan is confirmed as 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. We will ensure all arrangements are in place for a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services
